member.name: DWM_THUMBNAIL_PROPERTIES
member.summary: Specifies Desktop Window Manager (DWM) thumbnail properties. Used by the function.

member.name: DWM_THUMBNAIL_PROPERTIES.dwFlags
member.summary: A bitwise combination of DWM thumbnail constant values that indicates which members of this structure are set.

member.name: DWM_THUMBNAIL_PROPERTIES.rcDestination
member.summary: The area in the destination window where the thumbnail will be rendered.

member.name: DWM_THUMBNAIL_PROPERTIES.rcSource
member.summary: The region of the source window to use as the thumbnail. By default, the entire window is used as the thumbnail.

member.name: DWM_THUMBNAIL_PROPERTIES.opacity
member.summary: The opacity with which to render the thumbnail. 0 is fully transparent while 255 is fully opaque. The default value is 255.

member.name: DWM_THUMBNAIL_PROPERTIES.fVisible
member.summary: TRUE to make the thumbnail visible; otherwise, FALSE. The default is FALSE.

member.name: DWM_THUMBNAIL_PROPERTIES.fSourceClientAreaOnly
member.summary: TRUE to use only the thumbnail source's client area; otherwise, FALSE. The default is FALSE.
